Internal systems exhibiting suspicious o.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek dns.log, Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 5156
Internal systems exhibiting suspicious o.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and dns.log for connections or DNS requests to known or suspicious C2 infrastructure IPs/domains. Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 and 5156 for unusual outgoing connections from endpoints/servers, particularly executables with low prevalence or unsigned binaries. Use correlation analysis to link suspicious network activity with process execution.

Increased volume of network traffic or s.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for anomalous traffic volume from external sources targeting public-facing services. Analyze connection sources and destinations for patterns indicative of coordinated activity from diverse origins. Use time series analysis to detect sudden surges in traffic volume or connection attempts that deviate significantly from baseline levels.
